modName: Equippable Pubic Hair for Sevenbase 7B and UNP UNPB
summary: Sort of a mashup of other works I put together for fun, releasing for others to enjoy. 4 Different pubic hair meshes for 7B and UNP bodies that adjust to your characters hair color.
descriptionHtml:
[size=10][color=blue]Overview[/color][/size]

Equippable pubic hair that adapts to the players hair color!

I got tired of the silly flat pubic hair overlays and body textures, so I looked around for a simple 3D mesh for pubic hair. I threw together the works of DemonHunter, Nuclearsatan and DorkDiva, adjusted for the 7B bodies, and retextured them. The color range is good in my opinion and matches the hair well. I also added the scripts SydneyB used for the Princess of the Woods armour to set the hair color when equipping the item. The latest version uses biped slot 60.

[b]Choose either 7B or UNP version.[/b]

Includes 5 variants: Normal, Bushy, Bushier, Landing Strip and Kempt

To get them, either craft them at a tanning rack, or type "help pubes" and use "player.additem ######## 1"

Please inform me of any issues!!

[size=5][color=red]Requires SKSE v1.6.16 or higher[/color][/size]


[size=10][color=blue]Changelog[/color][/size]

[color=red]v1.4[/color]
- Added new variant "Kempt"
- Generated new forms for all items (to achieve consecutive formIDs)
- Included script fix

[color=red]v1.3c[/color]
- This is only a hotfix for the script to set the hair color at game load. Overwrite the main file.

[color=red]v1.3b[/color] - Latest
- Changed all biped slots to 60
- Added seperate UNP version for better WeightSlider support at lower weight

[color=red]v1.3[/color]
- Added new variant "Bushier" (watch out, it's bushier)
- Added WeightSlider support for ALL variants

[color=red]v1.2[/color]
- Slight adjustments to alignment of "Landing Strip" variants
- Added WeightSlider support for "Landing Strip" variants

[color=red]v1.1[/color]
- Added Light and Heavy variants
- Added support for enchants and upgrades
- Added WeightSlider support for "Normal" variants
- Now craftable at Tanning Rack

[color=red]v1.0[/color]
- Initial Release, no WeightSlider support


[size=10][color=blue]Installation[/color][/size]

Install using NMM
[color=yellow]-OR-[/color]
Extract files to Data folder


[size=10][color=blue]Uninstallation[/color][/size]

Uninstall using NMM
[color=yellow]-OR-[/color]
Delete the [u]following[/u] from your Data folder:
.../textures/actors/character/female/eqPubHair.dds
.../textures/actors/character/female/eqPubHair2.dds
.../textures/actors/character/female/eqPubHair_n.dds
.../scripts/PubesObjectScript.pex
.../scripts/PubesQuestScript.pex
.../meshes/clothes/pubes
.../EquippablePubes.esp


[size=10][color=blue]Known Issues[/color][/size]

- [s]When loading a save, script does not correctly set color if already equipped. Not sure why yet. Just re-equip to fix.[/s] - [b]FIXED[/b]


[size=10][color=blue]Credits[/color][/size]

Credit for the meshes go to [i][b]DemonHunter[/b], [b][url=http://cgkrista.blogspot.com/]Kris†a™[/url][/b], [b]Nuclearsatan[/b] and [b]DorkDiva[/b][/i].
Credits for the color script go to [i][b]SydneyB[/b][/i].
author: DemonHunter - Krista - Nuclearsatan - DorkDiva - SydneyB - Casmithy
